content:encoded:
Case Closed opens with Crime Classics this time. We’ll hear their story from November 25, 1953, The Killing Story Of William Corder And The Farmer’s Daughter.

(29:52) Our second story comes from This Is Your FBI. From April 11, 1947, we’ll hear episode titled, The Curious Patient.

Download CaseClosed696
